# Overview

Quick reference for using tmux and descriptions of some of the scripts to automate.

# Quick reference
```bash
session_name="example"
tmux # enter new tmux session
tmux --help
tmux ls
tmux attach -d -t $session_name
tmux kill-session
tmux switch-client -t $session_name
tmux choose-tree
```

```tmux
<Ctrl+B> D # deattach
<Ctrl+B>
<Ctrl+B>
```
